Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Ofiusa in Ribeira (Palmeira), you'll be close to Museum of Valle-Inclan. This beach hotel is within the vicinity of Mirador de la Curota and Dolmen de Axeitos.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 49 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones and safes, and you can also request rollaway/extra beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Ofiusa. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Ofiusa. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Ofiusa in Ribeira (Palmeira), you'll be close to Museum of Valle-Inclan. This beach hotel is within the vicinity of Mirador de la Curota and Dolmen de Axeitos.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum of Valle-Inclan - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Mirador de la Curota - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Dolmen de Axeitos - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
O Con Do Forno Viewpoint - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Pedras River Natural Pools - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Area Grande Beach - 11 km / 6.8 mi
O Grove Aquarium - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Valle-Inclan House Museum - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi
Area das Pipas Beach - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Familia Mariscadora Monument - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Church of San Martino - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi
Paseo Maritimo - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Pedras Negras Marina - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi
Burato da Londra Beach - 13.1 km / 8.2 mi
Siradella Viewpoint - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Ofiusa is Santiago de Compostela (SCQ-Lavacolla) - 57.7 km / 35.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
